WorkItem.Description:
The module object only needs to hold scoring tool information at the point.

Specifically, for each scoring tool it ought to store:
* scoring tool name
* scoring tool parent category (a 2-level hierarchy is all we need, right?)
* raw score value for all sites
* normalized score for all sites

Also, we will need a method to recalculate a score somewhere (where a score, it's parent category subtotal, and the grand total are recalculated in order)
WorkItem.Summary: Create a data object to hold information on scoring tools

Comments.Message: Resolved with changeset 71867: Added the graph to the Utility Editor window. Hooked up the property grid to the graph using a cloned args object.
